english: It's as likely that he'll damn you as (that he'll) say "good morning" .
chinese: 他很可能向你说“早安”，也可能咒骂你一顿。

english: After hailing the morn with this second salutation, he threw a boot at the woman as a third .
chinese: 用这第二句话当作祝告早安之后，第三个动作是把一只靴子抛在那女人身上。

english: "good morning. mrs. d'orsey." a white haired bank veteran named tottenhoe joined edwina .
chinese: “早安，多尔西夫人。”托顿霍，一位白发苍苍的银行者职工来到埃德温娜身边。

english: And even the most superstitious villagers no longer take off their hats to the magpie and wish it good-morning .
chinese: 而且即使最迷信的村民也不再向鹊类脱帽致敬并祝它早安了。

english: As soon as he had got into the car , i said good morning to him in french and he replied in the same language .
chinese: 他一上了车，我就用法语向他道声早安，他也用法语同样回了我一句。
早安造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Hall greeted him jovially enough, but gorman and walson scowled as they grunted curt "good mornings. "
chinese: 霍尔兴致十足地向他打招呼，戈曼和沃森却满脸不豫之色，敷衍地咕哝句“早安”。

english: Good morning , mr . lloyd . your suite is ready
chinese: 早安，劳埃德先生您的套房准备好了

english: Good morning , tim . - good morning , mr . bigweld , sir
chinese: 早安，提姆-早安，大焊先生

english: - good morning , tim . - good morning , mr . bigweld , sir
Good morning , mr . lloyd . your suite is ready
chinese: 早安，劳埃德先生您的套房准备好了

english: She greeted her friends by saying " good morning !
chinese: 她用说"早安"来问候她的朋友们。

english: Good morning ! i hope all of you are doing well
chinese: 早安,我希望你们每一位都很好!

english: Sebastian : morning sir , what would you like
chinese: 西巴斯钦:早安先生，你想怎样剪？

english: Good morning . franklin company , may i help you
chinese: 早安，富兰克林公司，我能为你服务吗？

english: G00d m0rning , mrs . mcnally . and h0w are y0u t0day
chinese: 早安，麦克纳利夫人，今天您好吗？
